short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension that displays word and character count of text inside of a Google Doc

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Docs Word Count displays the word count and character count of a Google doc page. 

How does Google Docs Word Count work? 
- After installing the extension and pinning it to the extension bar, browse to a google docs page
- On the Google docs page, you should see a text box with the word and character count
- Refresh the web page (press CTRL+R) if you want an updated word count on the Google doc
